title: Commander Connad

properties.name: description
properties.value: Commander Connad is a barbarian located on the main floor of the Barbarian Outpost. He runs the Barbarian Assault Reward Shop for the Barbarian Assault minigame: players who have earned honour points while playing the minigame can talk to him to access the Reward Shop. There, players can spend points on levelling up their roles, buying penance gear, or gambling for items. Players can also talk to him to get their wave in the minigame reset to 1, or use penance gear on him to receive a point refund equal to 80% of the purchase price. he will not refund (broken) items, however he will refund locked items, consuming the trouver parchment in the process, so it is recommended to unlock before refuding

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Commander Connad
Commander Connad
Released4 January 2007 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationBarbarian Assault
Sells itemsBarbarian Assault Reward Shop
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to, Get-rewards
ExamineA slightly more approachable barbarian.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID1656

Commander Connad is a barbarian located on the main floor of the Barbarian Outpost. He runs the Barbarian Assault Reward Shop for the Barbarian Assault minigame: players who have earned honour points while playing the minigame can talk to him to access the Reward Shop. There, players can spend points on levelling up their roles, buying penance gear, or gambling for items. Players can also talk to him to get their wave in the minigame reset to 1, or use penance gear on him to receive a point refund equal to 80% of the purchase price. he will not refund (broken) items, however he will refund locked items, consuming the trouver parchment in the process, so it is recommended to unlock before refuding
